### Government Tender Announcement

*   Expected Contract Start Date: N/A

### Tender Description

This government tender notification is for the purchase of a laboratory dishwasher for Health Canada. All required supporting documents must be submitted by the closing date and time specified above.

### Attachment

No attachments. The complete text of this tender notification can be found on the Canadian government's procurement platform, [Ariba](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15607760?extsite=MTU2MDc3NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). For more information, please contact Corine Lavoie at the above-mentioned email address.
